page.title: 08LIMPSFIELD PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The Headmistress is assisted by four other teachers. The roll of this mixed maintained school is approximately 100 with the children attending for four years. The children's day begins at 9.00 am with daily assembly and ends at 3.15 pm, with morning and lunch breaks in between. Entering the first year the children adapt to school life and learn their letters and numbers. Gradually they are introduced to writing sentences and simple arithmetic. By the fourth year they will have covered some poetry, multiplication tables, music, needlework, art and R.E. Games entails football for boys and dodgeball for girls. The{Library}is open to everyone and uniform is compulsory. Lunches are provided at school costing Â£3.15 per week.
